languages.text: Before death The Lost Commissar will make the last order for his troops.

traits.locale_text: Before death The Lost Commissar will make the last order for his troops.

languages.text: When nearing death, Captain Walz commands his troops to execute his last order.
languages.original_text: Перед смертью капитан Вальц отдает своим людям последний приказ.

traits.locale_text: When nearing death, Captain Walz commands his troops to execute his last order.
When nearing death, Captain Walz commands his troops to execute his last order.
When nearing death, Captain Walz commands his troops to execute his last order.

languages.text: Перед смертью капитан Вальц отдает своим людям последний приказ.
languages.original_text: When nearing death, Captain Walz commands his troops to execute his last order.

languages.text: Kaptan Walz, ölmek üzereyken askerlerine son emrini yerine getirmelerini söyler.
languages.original_text: When nearing death, Captain Walz commands his troops to execute his last order.

traits.locale_text: Kaptan Walz, ölmek üzereyken askerlerine son emrini yerine getirmelerini söyler.

languages.text: Cuando está a punto de morir, el capitán Walz ordena a sus tropas que ejecuten su última orden.
languages.original_text: When nearing death, Captain Walz commands his troops to execute his last order.

traits.locale_text: Cuando está a punto de morir, el capitán Walz ordena a sus tropas que ejecuten su última orden.

languages.text: 沃尔茨队长陷入濒死状态时，会命令他的士兵执行最后的命令。
languages.original_text: When nearing death, Captain Walz commands his troops to execute his last order.

traits.locale_text: 沃尔茨队长陷入濒死状态时，会命令他的士兵执行最后的命令。

languages.text: Quand le capitaine Walz est aux portes de la mort, il donne un dernier ordre à ses troupes.
languages.original_text: When nearing death, Captain Walz commands his troops to execute his last order.

traits.locale_text: Quand le capitaine Walz est aux portes de la mort, il donne un dernier ordre à ses troupes.

languages.text: キャプテン・ワルツは、死が近づくと彼の部隊に最終命令を実行するよう指示する。
languages.original_text: When nearing death, Captain Walz commands his troops to execute his last order.

traits.locale_text: キャプテン・ワルツは、死が近づくと彼の部隊に最終命令を実行するよう指示する。

languages.text: Im Angesicht des Todes befiehlt Captain Walz seinen Truppen, seiner letzten Anweisung Folge zu leisten.
languages.original_text: When nearing death, Captain Walz commands his troops to execute his last order.

traits.locale_text: Im Angesicht des Todes befiehlt Captain Walz seinen Truppen, seiner letzten Anweisung Folge zu leisten.
